category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Vis_Doc_OpenOption
preference.preference_description: Specifies the behavior for opening the document by the embedded or standalone Lifecycle Visualization, in case the same document is already opened by that viewer. Valid Values: * "CreateNewDocument": to create a new document/view pair. * "ActivateExistingDocument": to activate the existing document/view pair. This is a default value.
